llm.feedback: Add explicit magnitude ranges and handle‑specific citations to each line, e.g. “0.5‑1% rally in dxy, 1‑3% rally in spx (B1KYJ1GPU)(FAN5RYW6T)”, and similarly for the Tesla verdict and Marvell miss. Keep each line a single sentence, include a probability, and use only the provided IDs for citations. Remove any extraneous wording or duplicated themes; the four items above now satisfy the handle‑mapping, catalyst‑window, magnitude, and probability requirements.
